description: Everton news: Send us your pictures from Goodison Park send-off
title: Everton news: Send us your pictures from Goodison Park send-off
title_page: Everton news: Send us your pictures from Goodison Park send-off - BBC Sport
maintext:
In just a few hours David Moyes and his players will walk out to a sea of blue at Goodison Park for the final time.
Emotional yet?
In what will sure to be a fitting send off to the Grand Old Lady, we want you to send us your photos and stories from the day.
